alert.note: Alert for Bronx; New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:27PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, southeastern Bergen, Queens, Bronx and New York (Manhattan) Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1227 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hoboken, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Hackensack, Bergenfield, Lyndhurst, Rutherford, Secaucus, Harrison, Ridgefield, Midtown Manhattan, RFK Bridge, Laguardia Airport and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
